company: neue fische - School and Pool for Digital Talent

logo.label: neue fische - School and Pool for Digital Talent

description: I'm happy to rejoin the fabulous neuefische, to take the opportunity to attend their Java-and-Spring-Bootcamp and solidify my OOP-Skill in another strictly typed language. Four intensive yet joyful months of full-time programming in order to progress profoundly into full-stack development. My capstone project in this Bootcamp is the given website you're currently visiting.

- Responsibility for further development and maintenance of the CarbonStack platform
- Design and implementation of React-based components and pages with extensive CSS and Tailwind design integration
- Formation of a MongoDB-based backend database and development of a corresponding REST-API
- Development of a project database for geoinformation storage
- Database objects' processing in a React application

description:
Intensive full-time coding bootcamp.
 
 540 hours of programming practice, including the development of an app as a final thesis (capstone project)
 
 Applied technologies and tools: JavaScript ES2020, React latest, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Storybook, Cypress, Nodejs, Express, MongoDB, mongoose, Postman, Shell, npm, git workflow.
